p: To assess the cytotoxicity and selectivity of 12c towards cancer cells, normal epithelial breast MCF-10A cell viability study was carried out. As shown in Figure 5(A), the IC 50 value of 12c was more than 50 µM in MCF-10A cells, which was significantly higher than the IC 50 values of 19, 10, 22 and 42 nM in MCF-7, HL-60, HCT-116 and HeLa cancer cell lines, respectively. Remarkably, 12c was found to be less toxic in normal MCF-10A (IC 50 >50 µM) when compared to CA-4 (IC 50 = 6.1 µM) ( Figure 5(B)), suggesting 12c to have better selective toxicity against cancer cells.
